description: SHA1 is a broken hash algorithm and should not be used for any cryptographic purposes. It can be easily broken by collisions and preimages, and it has been deprecated by NIST. Instead, use a more secure hash algorithm like SHA-256 or SHA-512.
recommendation: Replace `MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA1")` with `MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-256")` or `MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-512")`. Be sure to also use a secure random number generator to generate the salt and IV, and to properly handle the padding of the input data.
